title: HARVESTER MACHINE HARVEST CROPS | NO COPYRIGHT VIDEO | NO COPYRIGHT VIDEO BACKGROUND | 4K | HD

tasks.task: Driving a combine harvester to harvest a field
subtasks: Sit in the driver's seat of the combine harvester
Operate the steering wheel to guide the combine through the field
Monitor the harvest progress and adjust settings as necessary
Engage the harvesting mechanism to cut the crop
Oversee the processing of the harvested crop into the machine
Walking behind the combine to collect dropped crop
Load the collected crop into containers or bins
Transport the filled containers or bins to the storage facility
Walk through the harvested field to inspect the remaining plants
Note any signs of disease, pests, or irregular growth patterns
Document observations for future farming practices

tasks.task: Preparing for the next farming cycle
subtasks: Clearing the fields of debris and unwanted vegetation
Conducting soil tests to assess nutrient levels
Planning crop rotation or fertilizer application based on test results
